parent_collections.title: LRRK2-G2019S Synergizes with Ageing and Low-Grade Inflammation to Promote Gut and Peripheral Immune Cell Activation that Precede Nigrostriatal Degeneration - ASAP protocol collection

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k7kb","text":"Perform gene expression on tissue samples of the ventral midbrain (containing the substantia nigra pars compacta, SNpc).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42p1p","text":"At due time points, homogenize tissue samples in   of QIAzol Lysis Reagent (Qiagen, #79306) using a rotor-stator homogenizer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"B9CD8200CFA511ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"u1s","text":"Isolate the total RNA from homogenized tissue samples using RNeasy Lipid Tissue Kit (Qiagen, #74804) including Dnase digestion. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6edg6","text":"At the end, re-dissolve RNA samples in   of RNase-free water and determine their concentrations spectrophotometrically by A260 (Nanodrop-ND 1000). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":123,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3vnvt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"D78F2730CFA511ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bu4l8","text":"Perform cDNA synthesis using Retroscript Kit (Ambion #1710, Austin, Texas) according the manufacturer’s instructions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cpun","text":"Add   of water solution containing   of each pool to an equal volume of 2X TaqMan Universal PCR Mastrer Mix (Applied Biosystems). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6neq7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"F8CA3BB0CFA511ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"FBAC9B20CFA511ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2kjr1","text":"Perform real-time quantitative PCR using TaqmanTM Assay Reagents on an Step One Detection System (Applied Biosystems) according to manufactures protocol. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bme8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34fns","text":"Lyse the cell samples in lysis buffer (Qiagen) and store at   until the RNA extraction following manufacture’s instructions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"493AAC29CFA511ED86FF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54bls","text":"Remove residual genomic DNA by incubating with DNase I, RNase-free (Qiagen) and elute from the RNeasy mini columns with RNase-free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23sse","text":"Quantify the amount of total RNA was using a NanoDrop ND-100 (Nano Drop Technologies) and synthesize the cDNA from   of total RNA using the Retroscript Kit (Ambion). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"6F9CC820CFA611ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qh1m","text":"After purification using QIAquick PCR Purification kit (Qiagen), use   of cDNA for Real-time PCR using pre-developed Taqman Assay Reagents (Applied Biosystems). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmke4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"7C92A720CFA611ED8C0153C9F8DFAAD3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1112p","text":"Perform real-time quantitative PCR with Step One Detection System (Applied Biosystems) according to manufacturer protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r8gr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"243lc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66pik","text":"We used the housekeeping gene, β-actin, as normalizer and embryonic mouse brain as calibrator. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"802d9","text":"Using the delta delta Ct (2-ΔΔCt) comparative method, quantification of the abundance of target gene expression was determined relative to β-actin with respect to the control group, express the results as arbitrary units (AU). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":23,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t7ef","text":"Indicate relative fold changes over WT in the respective treatment groups.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Gene Expression
